forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West southwest wind 14 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 8 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
The evening air descends gently upon Downtown San Francisco, ushering a soothing calm as the sun dips below the horizon. Tonight, the sky presents a canvas of clarity, inviting dusk’s embrace with a palette of soft blues and muted grays. The whispers of a west-southwest wind dance through the streets, its gentle touch a reminder of the day’s warmth, lingering just enough to dispel any chill. A comfortable low of around fifty-four degrees awaits as the atmospheric curtain falls, promising a night devoid of the ominous fog that sometimes blankets this city.

As one strolls through the now quiet avenues, the charm of San Francisco beckons for simple pleasures. A short meander to your favorite café might be just the evening’s ticket; the inviting scents of roasted coffee and freshly baked pastries infuse the air, calling for solace in a warm cup. Alternatively, a stroll along the Embarcadero, where the city’s silhouette stands proud against a star-speckled sky, might be a rejuvenating escape. Be sure to wear layers, for the enchantment of the breeze promises both warmth and a slight chill as night settles in. Tonight, the city wraps itself in an embrace that is both lively and tender, a perfect invitation to savor the moments that the evening brings.
